name: Luigi
description:
The Ultimate transition was really benefic for Luigi. Not only he's overall buffed in terms of speed and damage, but he also got a notorious 0-to-death, consisting of DThrows startups and finishing in almost whatever the player wants. Yes, even UpB. That's simple : Get grabbed, and you lose a stock.

Even out of this 0-to-death, DThrow combos into every single move and his grab is now a tether. The only regret would be his DownB (Unfamous Mash B) which no longers has utility for recovering
A must-play for any combos fan.

combos.input: dthrow sh+rising+dair ff+nair sh+rising+dair ff+dair uspecial
combos.notes: Credit to Beefy Smash Doods. Works from 0-10% on Heavyweight and Super Heavyweights if you perform another sh+dair into ff+nair before continuing. Adding/removing pummeling can enable this combo when it otherwise wouldn't work.
Credit to Beefy Smash Doods. Adding pummeling can enable this combo when it otherwise wouldn't work.
